verses.roman:
vṛddha-kuṣmāṇḍa-baḍīra vyañjana apāra
phulabaḍī-phala-mūla vividha prakāra

synonyms: vṛddha-kuṣmāṇḍa-baḍīra—of small pieces of fried dhal mixed with ripe pumpkin; vyañjana—vegetables; apāra—unlimited; phula-baḍī—small fried pieces of another kind of dhal; phala—fruits; mūla—roots; vividha prakāra—of different varieties.
translation: There were unlimited quantities of vṛddha-kuṣmāṇḍa-baḍī, phula-baḍī, fruits and various roots.
